TopicTitle: Game doesn't start. Here's the crash report.

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

I cannot start the game since October'17. It crashes when loading after 20-30 secs. I hoped that future updates might fix the problem, but even re-installing via Steam didn't fix it ever since. The crash message asks me to send the crash report to the devs, so here I am sending it to you guys and hope someone will be able to help me: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1JsJLiHcpGgSEgrCywTAYcKeaLH9QTvoH

I have several crash reports, but I guess they will all be the same as the crash always happens in the same way. But if you request it, I can also zip them up if needed.

Best regards,

Konseq

33 minutes ago, Konseq said:

Hello everyone,

I cannot start the game since October'17. It crashes when loading after 20-30 secs. I hoped that future updates might fix the problem, but even re-installing via Steam didn't fix it ever since. The crash message asks me to send the crash report to the devs, so here I am sending it to you guys and hope someone will be able to help me: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1JsJLiHcpGgSEgrCywTAYcKeaLH9QTvoH

I have several crash reports, but I guess they will all be the same as the crash always happens in the same way. But if you request it, I can also zip them up if needed.

Best regards,

Konseq

Without even looking at the crash log, I'm gonna go ahead and suggest you double check you don't have any old mods lying around in your install. Steam won't remove mod folders, and they will crash your game at load if they are out dated.

Edited January 8, 2018 by Rocket In My Pocket

On 8.1.2018 at 7:24 PM, Rocket In My Pocket said:

Without even looking at the crash log, I'm gonna go ahead and suggest you double check you don't have any old mods lying around in your install. Steam won't remove mod folders, and they will crash your game at load if they are out dated.

Good call.! Thanks for that tip, doing that fixed it!

1 minute ago, Konseq said:

Good call.! Thanks for that tip, doing that fixed it!

No prob, glad to hear it!
